content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --SPCUFL
      operator: exists
    - name: --SPCUFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: N
    - name: --SPCUFL
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000116
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --SPCUFL is not null or equal to "N"
Outcome:
  Message: --SPCUFL is not null or equal to 'N'
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0619
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The value will be "N" if the specimen is not usable,
                  and null if the specimen is usable.
                Document: SDTM v2.0
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --SPCUFL is not null or equal to "N"

Outcome.Message: --SPCUFL is not null or equal to 'N'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The value will be "N" if the specimen is not usable, and null if the specimen is usable.
